itunes:title: JUN 03, 2022 - BIDEN ADMIN DECLARES WAR ON THE 2ND AMENDMENT
title: JUN 03, 2022 - BIDEN ADMIN DECLARES WAR ON THE 2ND AMENDMENT
description:
President Joe Biden cracks down on firearm regulations as he pushes for the reinstatement of the 1994 Federal Assault Weapons Ban. Jack Posobiec analyzes the recent election of China to the World Health Organization (WHO) executive board, to which no democracy objected, in spite of China’s horrific human rights track record. Posobiec provides his take on former attorney Michael Avenatti being sentenced to another four years in prison for cheating Stormy Daniels out of $300k. Amidst the global food shortages, Egypt has banned all third party trading of wheat - having purchased the entire harvest - until the end of August. 


Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 


Save up to 65% on MyPillow products by going to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO 


Go to www.goodranchers.com/poso to get $30 off your order and free express shipping with code POSO
